title: Video: Hundred Waters â€“ Cavity
content:
One of THE songs of SXSW, LA quartet Hundred Waters released this shortly before the festival kicked off, however it became slightly lost under the manic rush of SX-prep.

A darker, more epic sound than experienced on their fantastic debut LP, Cavity was the highlight of their Saturday afternoon live set, suggesting that LP2 could well be one of the standout records of 2014. Check out the stunning video below, and grab the album when it drops on 27 May.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
